com.licel.jcardsim.base

Class Simulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.licel.jcardsim.base.Simulator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CardInterface, JavaCardInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JavaxSmartCardInterface

    public class Simulator
extends Object
implements JavaCardInterface
    Simulates a JavaCard.

      • runtime

        The simulator runtime

    • Constructor Detail

      • Simulator

        public Simulator()
        Create a Simulator object using the default SimulatorRuntime.
        • All Simulator instances share one SimulatorRuntime.
        • SimulatorRuntime#resetRuntime is called
        • If your want multiple independent simulators use Simulator(SimulatorRuntime)

      • Simulator

        public Simulator(SimulatorRuntime runtime)
        Create a Simulator object using a provided Runtime.
        • SimulatorRuntime#resetRuntime is called
        Parameters:
        runtime - SimulatorRuntime instance to use
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if runtime is null

      • Simulator

        protected Simulator(SimulatorRuntime runtime,
                    Properties properties)

      • getProtocolByte

      • changeProtocol

        public void changeProtocol(String protocol)
        Description copied from interface: JavaCardInterface
        Switch protocol Supported protocols are:
        • T=0 (alias: *)
        • T=1
        • T=CL, TYPE_A, T0 (alias: T=CL)
        • T=CL, TYPE_A, T1
        • T=CL, TYPE_B, T0
        • T=CL, TYPE_B, T1
        Specified by:
        changeProtocol in interface JavaCardInterface
        Parameters:
        protocol - protocol to use
        See Also:
        JavaCardInterface.changeProtocol(String)

        Specified by:
        getProtocol in interface JavaCardInterface
        Returns:
        the current protocol string

        JavaCardInterface.getProtocol()
